title: [GER/EN] New Club for Thresh Mains : LANTERN™
body:
Hey !
You main Thresh and search for a club ?
The only condition is: 100k mastery points on Thresh 

Write a comment if you are interested ! 
[GER/EN]

LANTERN™

Alstax {{champion:412}}

replies.body:
Can i join? I have 260K on eune and would like to join on my EUW acc - Best HööK EUW.

I sent friend req.
can i Join? 150 k on thresh

> [{quoted}](name=BoostedbyCurry,realm=EUW,application-id=ElKI1ocy,discussion-id=tEHcKeNi,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-10-10T13:09:45.257+0000)
>
> can i Join? 150 k on thresh

Yes of course. But i can not find your name. Add me: Alstax
I would like to join 170 k

> [{quoted}](name=GU OwndByHypno,realm=EUW,application-id=ElKI1ocy,discussion-id=tEHcKeNi,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-17T14:16:46.383+0000)
>
> I would like to join 170 k

Yes ofc.

> [{quoted}](name=Takatos,realm=EUW,application-id=ElKI1ocy,discussion-id=tEHcKeNi,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-18T13:11:28.213+0000)
>
> can i join? 300k on thresh

Yes you can. I will invite you!
